DES KEY GENERATION PROCESS
==========================

Original 64-bit Key: 0000111100010101011100011100100101000111110110011110100001011001

Step 1: Apply PC-1 (64 bits -> 56 bits)
Key after PC-1: 01101000111111000100010010100001000100010011111010010110

Split into C0 and D0 (28 bits each):
C0: 0110100011111100010001001010
D0: 0001000100010011111010010110

Round 1:
Left shift by 1 bit(s)
C1: 1101000111111000100010010100
D1: 0010001000100111110100101100

Round 2:
Left shift by 1 bit(s)
C2: 1010001111110001000100101001
D2: 0100010001001111101001011000

Round 3:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C3: 1000111111000100010010100110
D3: 0001000100111110100101100001

Round 4:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C4: 0011111100010001001010011010
D4: 0100010011111010010110000100

Round 5:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C5: 1111110001000100101001101000
D5: 0001001111101001011000010001

Round 6:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C6: 1111000100010010100110100011
D6: 0100111110100101100001000100

Round 7:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C7: 1100010001001010011010001111
D7: 0011111010010110000100010001

Round 8:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C8: 0001000100101001101000111111
D8: 1111101001011000010001000100

Round 9:
Left shift by 1 bit(s)
C9: 0010001001010011010001111110
D9: 1111010010110000100010001001

Round 10:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C10: 1000100101001101000111111000
D10: 1101001011000010001000100111

Round 11:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C11: 0010010100110100011111100010
D11: 0100101100001000100010011111

Round 12:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C12: 1001010011010001111110001000
D12: 0010110000100010001001111101

Round 13:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C13: 0101001101000111111000100010
D13: 1011000010001000100111110100

Round 14:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C14: 0100110100011111100010001001
D14: 1100001000100010011111010010

Round 15:
Left shift by 2 bit(s)
C15: 0011010001111110001000100101
D15: 0000100010001001111101001011

Round 16:
Left shift by 1 bit(s)
C16: 0110100011111100010001001010
D16: 0001000100010011111010010110
